Subject: Torture
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron/Unicron:




Unitron writhed in pain in his CR chamber, slamming into the sides of the 
repairing device.  He was holding his head, unimaginable pain ripping through 
it like swords.  "You're dead..." he managed to get out, though almost 
inaudibly.  The pain was almost to much to try and speak.

/I CANNOT DIE.  I, AM UNICRON, THE CHAOS-BRINGER/

The voice boomed inside of Unitron's head, adding onto the pain greatly.

"What...do...you...want?"

/YOU WILL SERVE ME AGAIN, WILLINGLY OR UNWILLINGLY.  IT IS YOUR CHOICE/

"...fine..."  As soon as the word escaped his mechanical lips, the pain 
stopped just as suddenly as it had started.  Still weak, Unitron barely 
pulled himself to his feet.  "What...do you...want me to do?"

/CONTINUE ON WITH YOUR PLANS, WITH MY GUIDANCE/
